00022 /// @defgroup cpSimpleMotor cpSimpleMotor
00023 /// @{
00024 
00025 const cpConstraintClass *cpSimpleMotorGetClass();
00026 
00027 /// @private
00028 typedef struct cpSimpleMotor {
00029         cpConstraint constraint;
00030         cpFloat rate;
00031         
00032         cpFloat iSum;
00033                 
00034         cpFloat jAcc, jMax;
00035 } cpSimpleMotor;
00036 
00037 /// Allocate a simple motor.
00038 cpSimpleMotor *cpSimpleMotorAlloc(void);
00039 /// initialize a simple motor.
00040 cpSimpleMotor *cpSimpleMotorInit(cpSimpleMotor *joint, cpBody *a, cpBody *b, cpFloat rate);
00041 /// Allocate and initialize a simple motor.
00042 cpConstraint *cpSimpleMotorNew(cpBody *a, cpBody *b, cpFloat rate);
00043 
00044 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpSimpleMotor, cpFloat, rate, Rate);
00045 
00046 /// @}
